title: Pan Fried Brussel Sprouts
summary: Pan Fried Brussel Sprouts is a gluten free and vegetarian side dish. For $1.4 per serving, this recipe covers 19% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe makes 4 servings with 273 calories, 6g of protein, and 24g of fat each. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 20 minutes. 6 people have made this recipe and would make it again. Head to the store and pick up shallot, piima cream, walnuts, and a few other things to make it today. With a spoonacular score of 83%, this dish is amazing.
